    • Uses of ConferenceException in estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.interfaces

      Methods in estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.interfaces that throw ConferenceException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Conference.addSession​(Session session)
      Adds a new session to the Conference Sessions can only be added to the conference while the conference state is: on editing
      void Conference.checkIn​(Participant participant)
      Checks in a new participant to the conference.
      void Conference.generateParticipantCertificates​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Generate the certificates for all participants (including speakers) The certificates can only be generated only when conference is finished
      void Conference.generateSpeakerCertificates​(java.lang.String filepath)
      Generate the certificates for the speakers that have performed presentations The certificates can only be generated only when conference is finished
      Participant Conference.getParticipant​(int id)
      Return an existing participant from a @param id
      Session[] Conference.getRoomSessions​(int roomId, java.time.LocalDateTime startDate, java.time.LocalDateTime endDate)
      Return the existing session from a room id considering a datetime interval

      Return a existing session from a @param id

      Removes the session in the conference
